title: Ranked Provisinouals
body: 1. I did my Provisinouals and I went 9-1 I got bronze 2 tho I would like to know the algorithm please.

replies.body: If you played ranked last game, they'll use your last season's MMR to place you against similar opponents then they'll adjust a little depending on your win/loss result. If you never played ranked, you'll start rated at 1200 and then they'll adjust from there, even if you win or lose all your matches you won't be placed insanely far from where you currently stand. Also, people going 5-5 will usually see a small drop in their ranking. I was Gold IV, won 5-5 and I dropped to Silver II. If you are really worth more that where they placed you, it shouldn't be very lon for you to climb the ladders.

You're full of shit. Normal MMR and ranked MMR have nothing to do with each other. Your starting rating is 1200 if you're playing ranked for the first time. If you get placed in a bad rating after doing well on your placements that means that your MMR from last season is pretty crappy.

Otherwise, it's because your mmr is glorious. If you are good, then you should easily get out of bronze.
If you are better than bronze 2, then you'll get out.
i won 1 game out of 10 and got bronze 4
Your wins and losses don't matter persay.  It is your MMR.  I was 6 losses and 4 wins, I got into gold 3.
It matters what your ranking was last season and if a person is unranked, even if they win all 10 the highest you can be placed is Silver 1 depending on their skill level.
If it is your fist time playing unranked, I don't know.  I remember being thrown into silver 1, but that was some time ago.
